1<?php
2/**
3 * Copyright (C) 1997-2020 Reyesoft <info@reyesoft.com>.
4 *
5 * This file is part of LaravelJsonApi. LaravelJsonApi can not be copied and/or
6 * distributed without the express permission of Reyesoft
7 */
8
9declare(strict_types=1);
10
11namespace Reyesoft\JsonApi\Core;
12
13use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Core\Helpers\IncludedSorter;
14use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Core\Helpers\SchemaValidators;
15use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Exceptions\ActionResourcePolicyException;
16use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Exceptions\WrongDataReceivedException;
17use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Facades\JsonApi;
18use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Http\AppResponses;
19use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Requests\JsonApiRequest;
20use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Services\DataService;
21use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Services\EloquentDataService;
22use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
23use Zend\Diactoros\Response;
24
25class RequestHandler
26{
27    /**
28     * @var JsonApiRequest
29     */
30    private $jsonapirequest;
31    private $data;
32    private $meta = [];
33
34    public function __construct(JsonApiRequest $jsonapirequest)
35    {
36        $this->jsonapirequest = $jsonapirequest;
37    }
38
39    public function handle(): self
40    {
41        $action = $this->jsonapirequest->getAction();
42
43        if ($action->isSaving()) {
44            $this->handleSavingRequest($action);
45        } else {
46            $this->handleNotSavingRequest($action);
47        }
48
49        return $this;
50    }
51
52    private function handleNotSavingRequest(Action $action): void
53    {
54        $empty = [];
55        $this->callPolicyOrFail($action, $empty, true);
56        $this->data = $this->getDataFromService($action);
57    }
58
59    private function handleSavingRequest(Action $action): void
60    {
61        $data = &$action->getData();
62        SchemaValidators::validateDocumentDataOrFail($data, $this->jsonapirequest->getAvailableSchemas());
63
64        $this->callPolicyOrFail($action, $data['data'], true);
65
66        $resources = $this->getResourcesArraySortedForSave($data);
67        $sorted_resources = $resources->getSortedResources();
68
69        try {
70            $this->getDataService($action)->openTransaction();
71            $this->handleSavingRequestProcess($action, $data, $sorted_resources);
72            $this->getDataService($action)->closeTransaction();
73        } catch (\Exception $e) {
74            $this->getDataService($action)->rollbackTransaction();
75
76            throw $e;
77        }
78    }
79
80    private function handleSavingRequestProcess(Action $action, &$data, $sorted_resources): void
81    {
82        $new_ids = [];
83        foreach ($sorted_resources as $resource) {
84            JsonApiHelper::replaceIdOnResourceRelationships($resource, $new_ids);
85
86            // @todo we are detecting data of parent resource. we need better way (or a abstraction)
87            if ($resource['type'] === $action->getData()['data']['type'] && $resource['id'] === $action->getData()['data']['id']) {
88                // @todo this will be work with replacing $action->getData()['data'] by $resource
89                //  this fill attribute no-presented on schema
90                $this->data = $this->saveResource($action->getData()['data'], $action, true);
91            } else {
92                $object = $this->saveResource($resource);
93
94                if ($resource['id'] !== '' && IncludedSorter::isIdNew($resource['id'])) {
95                    if (isset($new_ids[$resource['id']])) {
96                        throw new WrongDataReceivedException('Repeated `' . $resource['type'] . '` id `' . $resource['id'] . '`.');
97                    }
98                    $new_ids[$resource['id']] = $object->id;
99                    $resource['id'] = $object->id;
100                    JsonApiHelper::replaceIdOnDocumentRelationships($data, $new_ids);
101                }
102            }
103        }
104        JsonApi::pendingSaves()->call($new_ids);
105
106        if (method_exists($this->data, 'fireFinalSaved') && $this->data->fireFinalSaved() === false) {
107            throw new WrongDataReceivedException('Final Save problem: ' . get_class($this->data));
108        }
109    }
110
111    private function callPolicyOrFail($action, &$resource, bool $main): void
112    {
113        $policy = $action->getSchema()->getPolicy($resource, $main);
114        if (!$policy->before() || !$policy->{'before' . ucfirst($action->getActionName()) }()) {
115            throw new ActionResourcePolicyException($action);
116        }
117    }
118
119    private function getResourcesArraySortedForSave(&$data): IncludedSorter
120    {
121        return new IncludedSorter($this->jsonapirequest->getAvailableSchemas(), $data);
122    }
123
124    private function getDataFromService(Action $action)
125    {
126        $service = $this->getDataService($action);
127        switch ($action->getActionName()) {
128            case Action::ACTION_GET:
129            case Action::ACTION_UPDATE:
130            case Action::ACTION_DELETE:
131                $data = $service->{ $action->getActionName() }($action->getId());
132
133                break;
134            default:
135                $data = $service->{ $action->getActionName() }();
136        }
137        $this->meta = $service->getMeta();
138
139        return $data;
140    }
141
142    private function saveResource(array &$resource, ?Action $action = null, bool $isMain = false)
143    {
144        $schema = $this->jsonapirequest->getAvailableSchemas()[$resource['type']];
145
146        if ($action === null) {
147            $action_name = IncludedSorter::isIdNew((string) $resource['id']) ? 'create' : 'update';
148            $action = new Action(
149                $action_name,
150                new $schema(),
151                (string) $resource['id'],
152                ['data' => &$resource]
153            );
154        }
155
156        $this->filterReceivedAttributesWithSchema($resource, $action, new $schema());
157
158        if (!$isMain) {
159            $this->callPolicyOrFail($action, $resource, false);
160        }
161
162        // send data to service
163        return $this->getDataFromService($action);
164    }
165
166    protected function getDataService(Action $action): DataService
167    {
168        $schema = $this->jsonapirequest->getSchema();
169        if ($schema::$service === 'undefined') {
170            return new EloquentDataService($action, $this->jsonapirequest);
171        }
172
173        $service_name = $schema::$service;
174
175        return new $service_name($action, $this->jsonapirequest);
176    }
177
178    public function getResponse(): Response
179    {
180        $responses = AppResponses::instance(
181            $this->jsonapirequest->getRequest(),
182            $this->jsonapirequest->getEncoder()
183        );
184        switch ($this->jsonapirequest->getRequest()->getMethod()) {
185            case Request::METHOD_POST: // create
186                return $responses->getCreatedResponse($this->data, '' /*  @todo url? */);
187            case Request::METHOD_DELETE:
188                return $responses->getCodeResponse(200);
189            default:
190                $responses->getMetaResponse($this->meta);
191
192                return $responses->getContentResponse($this->data, AppResponses::HTTP_OK, []);
193        }
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * @todo $schema can be changed to string
198     */
199    private function filterReceivedAttributesWithSchema(array &$resource, Action $action, SchemaProvider $schema): void
200    {
201        $cru = $action->getActionName()[0];
202
203        $data_attributes = $resource['attributes'];
204        foreach ($data_attributes as $key => $value) {
205            // is on attributes array?
206            // its on attributes array but, has correct crud?
207            if (isset($schema->getAttributesSchema()[$key]) && CruHelper::canAccess($schema->getAttributesSchema()[$key], $cru)) {
208                // have permission to $cru
209                continue;
210            }
211
212            unset($resource['attributes'][$key]);
213        }
214    }
215}
